oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: US private purchase uniform
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A high quality private purchase uniform of Cpl. Walter A. (Abie) Gregory of Cades Cove, Blount County, Tennessee. Gregory served as a machine gunner in Co. B, 117th Inf. Regt., 30th Div. He received a serious wound and was reported killed in action. He escaped from the hospital and rejoined his unit. He farmed until his death in 1980. He purchased this uniform, made by Hart Schaffner & Mark of Chicago, at Davidson Clothing Co. of Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
